Many atimes we appreciate our jawans  by naming them army personnel. But bsf or crpf they fight for us every where all over india in very different situation from controlling riots , fighting naxals to securing international borders. This movie depicts that same life in a real way and honouring these paramilitary jawans. But it is also true that paramilitary forces lacks infra and fighting equipments. Just check pulwama attack, jawans were not sitting the bulletproof buses cause so many casualities, and definitly there were other reasons also but a big salute to all these bravr soldiers.

I watched this movie many times. it is a great depiction of life of BSF soldier. since my father too was a Head Constable and he was engaged in kargil, gujaratriots and north east conflicts this seems truely real for me. proud of my father and all soldier who serve for motherland.
